comments: Brother Slade expects you to put in the time and effort for his classes, be ready to do case studies and group projects. DONT PROCRASTINATE. He is always available outside class and willing to help you understand the material better.

comments: I have taken all of Brother Slade\'s classes. I didn\'t like him at first because he requires a lot out of his students. As time went on I found him to be one of my better and more organized professors and eventually came to favor him more than the other teachers. Always available outside of class and very helpful.

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: I\'ve studied with three different universities including BYUI. I can tell you from experience there is not a professor who is more personable and genuine with you. If you\'re indifferent with him and don\'t care about the class, he won\'t concentrate on you as much. Get to know him and show interest, and he will fight to help you get good grades.

comments: Great teacher. He expects you to come to class. Make sure that you study before every class so you can have questions for him.

comments: Brother Slade acts like he cares but he is one of the most arrogant professors on campus. Homework is based on a half thrown together excel that is poorly written and he does not give adequate grace for the mistakes he incorporates in it. Be ready for group work. Attendance isn\'t mandatory but expected.

stu_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS  TOUGH GRADER  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: This was a tough class. Not only are the lectures long, but he expects you to meet with him outside of class. You have an excel file that you build out throughout the semester, and you will need to meet with either Brother Slade or his TA in order to get through it.

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GROUP PROJECTS  GET READY TO READ
comments: This was an interesting class. You get to learn a lot about the best times to enter and leave the market, and you get to use the "stock-track" simulator. There are quite a few group projects/case studies, so be ready for those.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  LECTURE HEAVY  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: This class is two hours long, but Brother Slade does his best to make the class not be monotonous. Be prepared to do case studies, lots of case studies. Put your best effort into them, they are worth a lot of your grade.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Too much busy work. He can help and answer questions but I have studied at 3 different Universities. I have never had so much pointless busy work for a low level course. Waste of time. Try to take your courses from someone else. Good information but absolutely pointless assignments.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  SKIP CLASS? YOU WON\'T PASS.  GROUP PROJECTS
comments: The class itself was a little tedious and mundane, but Bro Slade as a teacher was bearable. The class isn\'t exciting, but he knows his stuff. He answers questions clearly and will go over things repeatedly until the majority of the class feels comfortable. ASK QUESTIONS. Everything builds off previous lessons so ask questions when you have them.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: RESPECTED  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA
comments: I\'ve learned more from his class than most others I have taken, he does expect a lot from you. If you do it though you will gain from his classes. If you\'re looking for a teacher who will be a breeze, don\'t take him. If you\'re looking to actually gain something from college, take him.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: I\'ve taken AgBus180B, 347, and 440 from him. Expectations are clear and he is quick to grade, give feedback, and has reasonable due dates. If you don\'t understand something take the time to go talk to him in his office. Great teacher. Certain topics may not be as clear, but just put forth more effort.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Great teacher, he knows what he\'s talking about and is happy to answer any questions. If you have trouble in his class you need to work harder.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: As a professor he will stick to what he has outlined previously, circumstantial situations are of no importance to him. For his economics course he adopted the class from another professor. READ SYLLABUS Carefully he isnot clear There is a lot of busy work, and no late assignments, so get them done on time. you also get points for attending class.

comments: Great teacher, explains concepts very well.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: If you do bad in his class it\'s your fault not his. He goes into as much detail as needed and if you have questions he will take the necessary time to help you. I love his passion, and punctuallity. He is always early and if you have questions he will work with you one on one. He is honest and fair and likes to help. Great proffessor

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Really easy class, just sat down and took notes on speakers and had about 3 or 4 easy projects. Slade is very friendly and you can definitely learn a lot from him. Take your laptop and write up the notes from the speaker and send it in during class to make it even easier.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Best class I\'ve taken in college! He is by far the best teacher. He does give a bit of homework, and challenges you to think. But that\'s what I\'m going to college for, to learn. Have also taken AGBUS 100, 450, and will take 347. Best teacher you\'ll ever have. Highly recommend.(PS he was a credit officer, not an accountant :))

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: Brother Slade was a great teacher. Some of his homework was challenging, but he was clear on what he expected and he helped us out a lot. It wasn\'t hard to get a good grade in his class.

tag_professor: GROUP PROJECTS (6)  Gives good feedback (5)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (4)  Clear grading criteria (3)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (3)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (3)  Tough Grader (2)  Participation matters (1)  LECTURE HEAVY (1)  Get ready to read (1)  Respected (1)
comments: I don\'t know what the other people that rated brother slade thought college was going to be like, but he is very fair and clear about what he expects! I would sure take all the classes I could from him!
